summary:
Over the course of my 20+ years career, I have had jobs in senior enterprise account management, senior enterprise solution sales, marketing and sales leadership. During these years I have always worked for dynamic high performance companies truly driving change and innovation.

My strategic consultative selling approach, focusing on realising business value for my clients and creating compelling events is part of my success.

As a Director Strategic Accounts my primary focus is to assist Global & Enterprise Companies to drive change & innovation, improve business processes, help the workforce become more productive and support business agility.

Specialties:
- Building Highly Motivated Teams to Win Together
- New Business Development (National & International)
- Marketing & Management
- Solution Development
- Enterprise Account Management
- Sales Management & Leadership
- Coaching on the job
- Feedback in the moment
- Business Process Management
- Change Management
- Architecture & Business Solutions
- Innovative Thinking (new concepts & implementing new ideas)
- Project Management
- Google Cloud Platform
- Microsoft Cloud Solutions
- Cloud Security
- Cloud Legal & Compliance
- Cyber Security
- GDPR organisation & information security impact
- Cloud Productivity (Google & Microsoft)
- SAAS (Software As A Service)
- Cloud Computing
- Online Web Collaboration

profile_positions.description: Digital transformation is more than “lifting and shifting” old IT infrastructure to the cloud for cost saving and convenience. True transformation spans the entire business and enables every person to transform. At Google we deeply understand today's technology requirements and the need to continuously innovate. That's why organizations build their transformation cloud and solve their biggest challenges with Google Cloud.

profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Tanium gives the world’s largest enterprises and government organisations the unique power to secure, control and manage millions of endpoints across the enterprise within seconds. 

Serving as the “central nervous system” for enterprises, Tanium empowers security and IT operations teams to ask questions about the state of every endpoint across the enterprise in plain English, retrieve data on their current and historical state and execute change as necessary, all within seconds. 

With the unprecedented speed, scale and simplicity of Tanium, organisations now have complete and accurate information on the state of endpoints at all times to more effectively protect against modern day threats and realise new levels of cost efficiency in IT operations.

Visit us at www.tanium.com or follow us on Twitter at @Tanium.
profile_positions.title: Director Strategic Accounts

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for new business development and account management to guide Global & Enterprise Accounts in the BeNeLux to experience the full potential of the HERE Technologies platform and support them to improve business outcomes with the added value of Location Intelligence Data.

Managing a virtual team of Business Solution Architects, Product Managers, Industry Solution Consultants and a Partner Account Executive team.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Enterprise Account Executive - Technology Media Telco & Retail

profile_positions.description:
ServiceNow makes work, work better for people. 

Transform old, manual ways of working into modern digital workflows, so employees and customers get what they need, when they need it—fast, simple, easy.

When people work better, business works better.

As a Senior Enterprise Account Executive at ServiceNow my primary focus is to assist Enterprise Companies both national and international to drive change & innovation, improve business processes, help the workforce become more productive, support business agility and use the full potential of each employee.

Managing a virtual team of Solution Sellers and Technical Sellers to fully support our customers on their Digital Transformation Journey.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Account Executive

profile_positions.description: Managing a virtual team to guide customers on their digital transformation journey and experiencing the full benefits of the Microsoft Cloud Platform ranging from productivity & security solutions to data lakes & artificial Intelligence.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Enterprise Account Executive

profile_positions.description: Working with a team of Technical Solutions Professionals to assist customers in accelerating their digital transformation journey with the Microsoft Productivity Cloud Platform. Ranging from online collaboration to implementing advanced security solutions.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Solution Sales Executive - Digital Transformation & Modern Workplace

profile_positions.description:
Senior Enterprise Account Executive Banking & Financial Services for a Multi-National Account headquartered in The Netherlands.

Managing an international virtual team to guide customers on their digital transformation journey and experiencing the full benefits of the Microsoft Cloud Platform ranging from productivity & security solutions to data lakes & artificial Intelligence.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Enterprise Account Executive - Banking & Financial Services

profile_positions.description:
Microsoft has a clear focus on innovation and moving people to The Cloud on their own terms.

Working as a Sr. Solution Sales Professional I manage direct strategic end user relationships on behalf of the account manager to deliver value based innovative solutions which utilize the resources, productivity, efficiency & mobility of these resources.
 
The role involves creating the need for a long term strategic relationship, whilst also identifying and closing new business opportunities based on solutions deliverable today.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Solution Sales Executive - Office365 & Business Productivity

profile_positions.description:
Enterprise Account Manager Benelux at a worldwide leader in Network, Unified Communication & Online Collaboration Solutions.

 A main part of this role is to exceed quarterly and annual revenue target, building and maintaining a constant/future accurate pipeline, engaging and presenting at multi levels within an account including board level, develop, maintain and implement account plans, engaging senior execs where required within assigned territory. 

Proven ability to produce weekly accurate forecasting and manage the designated territory to maximize both short and long term opportunities. 

The experience I have includes: dealing at C level, experienced, competent and comfortable with board level negotiations, competent and experienced in the application of target account selling methodology or other sales/business methodologies, experience working with the channel and system Integrators with a software background.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Account Manager - Benelux

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for relation- & partnership management in the financial sector with a strong focus on architecture and business process solutions.

As a Enterprise Account Manager in Process Management for the department Architecture & Business Solutions I fulfilled a horizontal sales position within the Sogeti organisation. Within this position I was responsible for the large enterprise accounts (Sector Finance) as well as provide other sales teams with knowledge and expertise on Business Process Management, as well as guide them in customer contact towards closing larger deals.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Account Manager Architecture & Business Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Working as an International Account Executive at Exact International b.v. I had a strong focus on multinationals with a HQ in the Netherlands. 

As an International Sales Executive the main activity was to realize added value through the ERP solution that Exact International has developed. 

This ERP solution is on the market in numerous countries. The communication & sale at this company starts in the Netherlands and with a project roll out is stretched throughout the world.
profile_positions.title: International Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
As a Product Manager I managed a project of setting up a new retail product / brand up and running in the Dutch market. This product can now be found on several online stores as well as the larger consumer electronics department stores in the Netherlands.

Next to this project my main responsibilities could be found in price setting, marketing (activities), sales support & management, product presentations & training, logistics, alliance management and stock control.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Microsoft Become a Buddy is a program to support jobseekers in the market today. The support can be from a simple CV check to interview and career coaching.
